story:
What are we doing?

We are selling stickers, picks, and t-shirts to spread the word that Guitarists Are Not Musicians. Help us spread the word and get some cool Guitarent merch!
50% of profits go to COVID19ResponseFund.org.

What We Need & What You Get

We've listened and are finally ready to offer you T-Shirts and picks. We need at least $700 to cover Stickers, Picks, and Shirts. Here's what you can get:

  • Sticker Packs! - 4 New designs!

  • Guitar Picks! - For your guitar playing friends!

  • T-Shirts! - Finally we have T-Shirts in 2 designs voted on by you!

  • Hoodies! - Two designs of Zip-Up hoodies!

If you want more than one perk add whichever of the perks is the most expensive and you will be offered the rest of the perks at a discount!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't afford to buy any of these great Guitarists Aren't Musicians items you can still help spread the word by sharing this Indiegogo with your friends, especially any friends you have that are guitarists.

story:
Summary

First I want to thank my dear friends and followers over the years who have been so supportive and appreciative  of my poetry and music. Who I am comes from my roots as a son of a farmer who was born in Amazonas Peru. My songs are woven from the tapestry of my life and my travels.

I am excited to be creating a new music CD and publishing my first book of Poetry. I am  asking for your help in the completion of my project. As a special sing of gratitude you will be receiving copies of my book and music with my personal dedication and signature.

Our challenge is to raise $15,000 in 30 days. I am calling on my friends and fans to spread the word and help out wherever you can. Please share via the indigogo share tools to your network of friends.

I am working with many talented musicians in Peru to create the recordings,  and I am so pleased with how the new CD is taking shape  in conjunction with my poetry book.

Your contributions will make both of these projects possible to complete, and allow my CD and book of Poetry to reach thousands more people.

Thank you from the bottom of my heart for your love and support throughout all of these years!

story:
Look at http://www.solarimpulse.com/ for the project we want to support with our music production.

This project is endorsed by Bertrand Piccard and "Solar Impulse".

Solar Impulse - Music Impulse

English (Deutsch siehe weiter unten): 


The Idea

Let's help Solar Impulse change the world.

We want to raise awareness for clean energy by composing an innovative musical creation and producing a video to it, so it can spread and touch people all over the world. We want to help change peoples minds about using energy. Away from fossil energy to renewable energy.

The Music

A musical journey by Martin Villiger and Steve Sidwell

The Sound-FX Choir conducted by Steve Sidwell performs a musical masterpiece telling the story of the special airplane in the quest for clean energy. Combined with a catchy chorus it has the ability to conquer the audiences and raise awareness for clean energy! Let's help Solar Impulse change the world.

Like the Solar Impulse consists of many people making this possible we wanted to produce a music consisting exclusively out of voices.

Take a look at this example (Steve Sidwell is also the featured conductor):

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h7RPm8G1OJg 

The Story

8 years ago I composed music to a film about Bertrand Piccard, the pioneer that flew around the world in a balloon and announced the Solar airplane. Since then I knew I wanted to contribute to this great idea of promoting clean energy. With joint efforts we can develop the technology that makes us more independent from fossil power. With the technology used in the solar airplane we could divide by two the use of fossil energy. So why isn't it done? 
I want to help the only way I know how, by composing and producing music that will carry the idea and spread it as far as possible.
I am a composer based in Switzerland. My work includes some compositions for acclaimed Swiss TV Documentaries and Series. My partner in this endeavor is Steve Sidwell who just won a Grammy! He conducts the SoundFX Choir, that does incredible Sounds only using their voices. 
www.martinvilliger.com (only in german)
www.stevesidwell.com (only in english)
The Video and additional Videos will be filmed and edited by Daniel Villiger, a very talented editor with credits ranging from Swiss TV, Red Bull, MTV and many more.
http://danielvilliger.com
Original Footage of the Songvideo were recorded by Emmanuel Gripon and his team.
http://lasourisverte.ch/
Our Communication will be managed by Markus Baumgartner from the b-public - team.
http://www.b-public.ch/en

How we will do it

We have already composed the music and will post a demo on May 1st.

The funding is used to produce a music single and a music video.
It includes:

  • Composing 
  • Arranging and preparing Notes for the choir
  • Producing a Demo
  • Studio rent for 3 days
  • Recording Sessions with the choir
  • Conducting and directing the recordings
  • Sound-Engineers
  • Filming the choir in the studio (Lighting, Camera, make-up, and so on)
  • Video Editing
  • Filming and editing a making-of.
  • Original Footage from flying airplane is kindly provided by "Solar Impulse"
  • Music editing
  • Music mixing and mastering
  • Grafics for the Single-artwork for physical and online cover
  • CD Prints
  • Launch
  • Communication and PR
  • Administration
  • Fees (indiegogo fee and payment handling)
  • Additional costs for special Perks.
This is an all or nothing campaign. If we don't reach our goal, all the money goes back to you the backers.
I already invested about 3 thousand Dollars in this project, so I could produce a Demo. I tried to downsize the budget as good as I could - it originally startet at over 90 thousand Euros.

Every Euro counts

Please consider backing this project, even if it is just with one Euro. Every Euro counts. As you know: we only get to do this, if the whole amount is covered.
You can also help by spreading the word, sharing with your friends via Facebook and Twitter.

The Impact

If we get the funding, this will be the official hymn for the around the world tour of Solar Impulse, which is by the way also entirely funded by sponsors.


Risks & Challenges

All the artistic challenges can be met. We have a tight timetable and should have the music for the final landing of Solar Impulse.

Can we be on time?

When we get the whole amount we will have to produce the music in a very short period of time to get it done fast enough to meet Bertrand Piccard and his teem at the final landing site. 

So, the sooner the project is fully funded the better ;-)


Other Ways You Can Help

You can use the indiegogo tools helping you share this project with friends and people you think might be interested.

Together we can help the voices for clean energy to be heard.

Yours sincerely

Martin Villiger, Composer.


Deutsch:

Ziel

Wir helfen "Solar Impulse" die Welt zu verändern. Mit dieser Musik und dem Videoclip möchten wir Bewusstsein für saubere Energien wecken.

Bertrand Piccard und sein Team bei „Solar Impulse“ möchten die Innovation im Bereich der erneuerbaren Energien anstossen und befeuern, die schlussendlich der gesamten Menschheit zugute kommen soll. Die Idee mit einem innovativen musikalischen Werk diesem Anliegen eine Stimme zu verleihen wird von der non-Profit Organisation „Solar Impulse“ begeistert unterstützt. 

Idee

Ein innovatives multimediales Werk spiegelt die innovative Idee vom Flug um die Welt durch Solar Impulse. Wir wollen "Solar Impulse" helfen die Welt zu verändern. 

Konzept Sound-FX Chor

Vor 8 Jahren habe ich die Musik zum Film „Das Leben als Ballonfahrt“ über Bertrand Piccard komponiert. Damals hat er das Solarflugzeug angekündigt. Seither war mir klar, dass ich gerne einen Beitrag mit meinen Möglichkeiten zu diesem grossartigen Projekt leisten möchte.

Dabei spielt der Sound-FX Chor von Steve Sidwell ein zentrale Rolle. Mit seinem innovativen Ansatz symbolisiert der Chor die Menschen, die hinter der Technologie stehen. Das Ziel, saubere Energie zum Wohl der gesamten Menschheit zu entwickeln bekommt ein musikalisches Sprachrohr, das ein grösseres Publikum erreichen und begeistern kann.

Dieses Beispiel zeigt den Chor in Aktion:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h7RPm8G1OJg 

Das musikalische Werk für Solar Impulse geht noch einen Schritt weiter, indem es von den reinen Effekten zu einer musikalischen Hymne übergeht, welche die Menschen emotional berühren kann.

Film und Multimedia

Die Vorbereitungen zum Flug und das anschliessende Abheben dieser grossartigen Idee des Solarfliegers werden gefilmt und zusammen mit der Musik als spartenübergreifendes, multimediales Gesamtwerk erzählt.

Medien

Es wird eine Single und ein Video produziert. Die Musik kann zusätzlich in Dokumentarfilmen, TV Beiträgen, Radio und Internet verbreitet werden um öffentliche Aufmerksamkeit aufzubauen und beizubehalten.

 Finanzierung

Wir brauchen Mittel für die Produktion einer hochwertigen Musik Single und einem ebenso hochwertigem Musik Video. 

Es gibt viele Produktionsschritte, die finanziert werden müssen:

  • Komposition
  • Arrangement und Noten vorbereiten für den Chor
  • Produktion eines Demos
  • Studio Miete für 3 Tage
  • Aufnahmen mit dem Chor
  • Aufnahmen leiten und Chor dirigieren
  • Ton-Ingenieure
  • Chor im Studio filmen - Kamera, Licht, Make-up, use
  • Original Aufnahmen mit freundlicher Genehmigung von "Solar Impulse"
  • Video Schnitt
  • Making-Of filmen und editieren
  • Musik editieren
  • Musik mischen und Mastern
  • Grafik herstellen für das Single-Cover (Physisch und Online)
  • CD Herstellung
  • Release der Single
  • Kommunikation und PR
  • Pressearbeit
  • Administration
  • Externe Kosten (Indiegogo und Zahlungen empfangen)
  • Zusätzliche Kosten für spezielle "Perks"

Jeder Euro zählt

Auch wenn Du nicht viel geben kannst: Schon ein Euro hilft diesem Projekt weiter. Je mehr Menschen sich dafür einsetzen, umso besser.
Dies ist ein "alles-oder-nicht-Projekt": Wenn das Budgetziel nicht erreicht wird, werden alle Beiträge direkt an Euch, die Unterstützer zurück bezahlt.

Risiken und Herausforderungen

Wir sind unter Zeitdruck, dieses Projekt möglichst rasch zu einem Abschluss zu bringen. Ende Mai, wenn das Flugzeug von "Solar Impulse" landet, sollten wir die fertige Produktion haben. Je eher also das Budget erreicht wird, desto besser ;-)

Danke!

Danke an alle, die bei diesem Projekt bereits mitgeholfen haben. Du kannst Dich auch einsetzen, indem Du dieses Projekt mit Deinen Freunden und Bekannten teilst, darüber etwas schreibst usw. 
Saubere Energie ist ein Thema, das alle Menschen weltweit betrifft. Es kann helfen uns unabhängiger von fossilen Brennstoffen zu machen. Es ist eine Sache, die wir gemeinsam angehen können. Ich versuche meinen Beitrag dazu zu leisten, dass diese Stimme gehört wird.
Mit freundliche Grüssen
Martin Villiger, Komponist.

story:
Summary

I am Brian Vaughan, a music creator and producer who goes by the name Strych9 based in St. Louis.  I’m also the owner of Magnum O.P.U.S. and the founder of “We Create Music”, a growing social community of music creators that believes in collaborating and empowering other music innovators and entrepreneurs.

I’ve been involved with music in many different aspects from singing to production. I was raised on Old School, RnB and Hip Hop music. The sounds of old school music flooded my house on a daily basis. My mom and aunt would do the hustle in our living room. There was an instant relationship and love created with music.  My cousin and I used to “pre-tape”, create our own “DJ Mix” versions of hip-hop songs on a double cassette boom box.  Growing up with music was always my way to deal with life. My way to escape into a world full of beats, rhymes, and rhythms.”

I began my own musical journey eight years ago - producing music and working with various like-minded indie artists who share a common goal of putting good music back onto the airwaves. Producing Overdose, (link to song samples) the R&B compilation album I’ve been working on for the past year, is one of the ways I hope to do this. But your help is needed to bring it to life.

Overdose, a ten-song compilation, will be the first of several projects, and features artists from across the U.S., including San Diego, Houston, St. Louis, New York and Montreal. Two other projects are in the works. Music isn’t only about a great beat, but full fledge projects. Overdose is my opportunity to not only showcase my production skills, but to add value and increase exposure for the members of We Create Music, a community of more than 7,000 members that I founded last year to promote and connect music creators worldwide.

 

Album Budget

Here is a projected budget to give you an idea of how funds will be allocated.

Expenses

 
  • Mixing Fees

$1500
  • Mastering 

$1500
  • CDs/Artwork/Distribution

$1200
  • Overdose Music Video

$1000
  • Marketing and Promotions

$2300
  • Studio Time

$1000

Fundraising Total

$8500

Indie GoGo Fees (4%)

-$340

Credit Card fees (3%)

-$244.20

Adjusted Total

$7915.80

 

Ways You Can Help

  1. Spread the word! Share this project on social media
  2. Connect via Instagram: www.instagram.com/strych9musik and www.instagram.com/WeCreateMusic
  3. Connect via Twitter: www.twitter.com/strych9musik
  4. Visit www.Strych9Musik.com to hear songs and updates on my newest projects
  5. Support this project! Your contribution shows that you care about quality in music. I appreciate your investment.

story:
Summary

Hello and much love from all of us at Ugoplatinum and welcome to our app development fundraising campaign! First and foremost, we at Ugoplatinum recognize that social media accounts for lion's share of time spent on mobile devices*; with that said, we understand the level of necessity having a mobile app these days. Ugoplatinum was made for artists by artists, artists like you or someone you know.

Ugoplatinum will always put music first because we’re more than a business - we’re a movement! We strive to give musicians a serious chance at success by equipping them with the tools that will afford them the opportunity to take their careers in their own hands.

Through Ugoplatinum, musicians gain the exposure they deserve, in turn giving them the choice to advance their career in the direction they choose. With your contribution, you will be giving musicians around the world the opportunity to make their dreams a reality! Our dream is that musicians will seize this opportunity and pursue their dreams to places they never expected. We at Ugoplatinum will encourage them to press on even after those dreams are realized!

We hope you will join our movement and contribute, and know we are going to change the world together! Thank You from all of us at Ugoplatinum and much love!

*There are currently more people regularly using mobile devices (tablets and smart phones) than laptops or desktop computers; apps account for 89% of mobile media time, with the other 11% spent on websites (SmartInsights.com).

What We Need & What You Get

Based on the proposals and quotes we've received from various app developers, building the Ugoplatinum app is going to cost between $20,000 - $30,000. This will be going to the app developers for the framework, design, and work hours it will take them to build our app.

We are offering perks for those who help to fund the app. 

Everyone who donates will be included on Ugoplatinum.com's permanent Wall of Fame as those who helped to build Ugoplatinum. This will include you photo (if you wish), Your Name, location, and, if you like, even a link to something near and dear to your heart - like your own business, perhaps.

Anyone who donates $20 will receive a free song from any Member Artist on Ugoplatinum.com. 

Anyone who donates $50 will receive five (5) free songs from any Member Artists on Ugoplatinum.com. 

Anyone who donates $100 will receive ten (10) free songs from any Member Artists on Ugoplatinum.com. 

And anyone who donates $500 or more will be entered in a drawing to receive a $78,000 Patek Philippe Nautilus Custom Diamond Men’s Watch. We're giving away one to each of the first five Artists to 'Go Platinum' (sell 1,000,000 individual songs) - and you can be in the running to receive Watch Number six! (Click here for details)

In the event that we do not reach our entire goal, proceeds will be put toward the app development anyway; we are determined to get this done and will simply use conventional means (loans, investors, revenue) to make up the difference.

The Impact

You may be familiar with the saying "Give a Man a Fish, and You Feed Him for a Day. Teach a Man To Fish, and You Feed Him for a Lifetime." Instead of donating money to various charities (which can indeed be helpful), your donation will help us to "teach musicians" in underdeveloped nations "how to fish." It is a fact that the funds generated by people in communities anywhere (as opposed to direct charitable donations) proliferates, since they wind up spending, investing, or contributing in their own communities, as opposed to charitable organizations, which have overhead, and often provide only staples.

Bringing "garage bands" in underdeveloped nations into the Ugoplatinum fold will help to accomplish what many traditional charitable organizations cannot.

Risks & Challenges

Since Ugoplatinum was founded by Beat producer Phoolish Sounds, his dad and a family friend - just regular working folks - all of the risk to date has been ours. However, Ugoplatinum has over 25 years of business experience in that mix, with all of its primary participants being musicians and people who know the music business. One of Ugoplatinum's founders has even had close personal and/or working ties to rock legends like Rick Derringer, Santana, and Journey! 

Being "regular" people who started Ugoplatinum out of a love for music and a desire to give back, of course we've been working "on a shoestring," building the company out of our own savings and income. Until we get some real revenue flowing (through customer purchases), this will continue to be the case.

As mentioned in the video, since so many more people are on mobile devices than computers and use apps rather than websites these days, we can't reasonably expect things to pick up as fast as they should until we get that app built.   

And as the video said, that's where you come in!

Other Ways You Can Help

If for some reason you just can't contribute (which we certainly understand), that doesn't mean you can't help. You can:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign through social media, and spreading our campaign link to your friends and followers.
  • Remember the old business saying: "Word-of-mouth is the best form of advertising!"
  • SHARE THE CAMPAIGN LINK WITH EVERYONE YOU KNOW!!!

Thank you ahead of time. Go out and have a great day!

- The Founders and Staff at Ugoplatinum
story_txt:
Summary
Hello and much love from all of us at Ugoplatinum and welcome to our app development fundraising campaign! First and foremost, we at Ugoplatinum recognize that social media accounts for lion's share of time spent on mobile devices*; with that said, we understand the level of necessity having a mobile app these days. Ugoplatinum was made for artists by artists, artists like you or someone you know.
Ugoplatinum will always put music first because we’re more than a business - we’re a movement! We strive to give musicians a serious chance at success by equipping them with the tools that will afford them the opportunity to take their careers in their own hands.
Through Ugoplatinum, musicians gain the exposure they deserve, in turn giving them the choice to advance their career in the direction they choose. With your contribution, you will be giving musicians around the world the opportunity to make their dreams a reality! Our dream is that musicians will seize this opportunity and pursue their dreams to places they never expected. We at Ugoplatinum will encourage them to press on even after those dreams are realized!
We hope you will join our movement and contribute, and know we are going to change the world together! Thank You from all of us at Ugoplatinum and much love!
*There are currently more people regularly using mobile devices (tablets and smart phones) than laptops or desktop computers; apps account for 89% of mobile media time, with the other 11% spent on websites (SmartInsights.com).

story:
Short Summary

 

Mo Javi is a classically trained and mostly self taught violinist who has been playing for 14 years. He specializes in Classical, Folk, and Blues, and can read music, write music, play by ear, and improvise. He has coined his original style as "Baroque Folk," combining influences from Bach, Mozart, Celtic, and American folk music. 

 

Royal Wedding is Mo Javi's very first Album, and he wants your help in bringing it to its fullest potential. If we can raise $1000, that will cover studio recording, mixing, and mastering expenses for the entire Album. As a result, it will be released FOR FREE. If the people make it, it's the people's. 

 

If you donate a substantial contribution of $10 or more (1% of the campaign goal), you will not only get to be awesome, but you will also get early access to Mo Javi's very first collaborative track, "Don't Cry," a R&B/Rock single due for release in December (but YOU get to hear it as soon as it's release ready)!

 

Please listen to Royal Wedding and support this campaign if you believe in the potential of this Album. If anything, please leave feedback (if you liked it or hated it), share it with your friends, and check out all of Mo Javi's other projects by visiting MoJaviMusic.com or just googling his name, "Mo Javi."

 

Thank you for your time, and please enjoy the music!

 

(Here is a link in case the video does not show on mobile: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=owjAXrAvv1Y

story:
As fangirls, we love seeing merch inspired by our favorite bands. Music is everything to us and we love the community that being in a fandom provides. We've seen so many amazing music inspired items and artwork that we wanted to provide a place to showcase them. So, we created The Bandom Box. The Bandom Box is a monthly subscription service that brings you unique and fun fan made merch items. You, as a subscriber, will be able to opt in or out for each month after the artist of the month is revealed.

To start the road trip to The Bandom Box, we need to raise money to begin manufacturing the items for the boxes. We are looking to raise $2,500 by selling 100 boxes. All of the money from this campaign will go directly to the first batch of orders and towards securing our LLC to be able to sell online.

If we do not reach our goal, all the funds will go back to you, the investor.

If you're an artist interested in contributing to future boxes or if you have any questions at all, please contact us at bandombox@gmail.com.

Follow us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook: @bandombox

story:
Short Summary

Miss Cactus (Alondra Ladd) is a singer-songwriter and dancer who's life has become dedicated to creating music inspired by her coastal Latino roots. Upon her acceptance to Berklee College of Music, Miss Cactus & the Desert was created to help Alondra's dream of bringing her music to the world come true. 

The up and coming reggae-indie group Miss Cactus & the Desert  is planning to take their music to next step by going on a tour to Puerto Rico and the Northeast upon the release of their upcoming EP Oasis. They plan to arrive at San Juan on August 21st to make radio appearances and perform at four venues across the island. After a week in PR, they will return to NYC and our across the Northeast.

Miss Cactus has long dreamt to travel to Puerto Rico where her style is expected be well received due to the island's strong reggae scene- help us bring island-inspired music to a beautiful and unique island that has deeply inspired the band!

By helping us you will be helping Miss Cactus & the Desert go on their very first tour since its creation, promote their very first EP a d reach new audiences! Miss Cactus has a passion for making people feel at peace and in touch with themselves through music that has been inspired by the beauty of the Caribbean and by traveling to a caribbean island, the band can achieve incredible success. The group has already been given the opportunity to play at some of the island's biggest venues, such as La Respuesta and appear at popular radio station shows and we need your help to take advantage of these huge opportunities!

What We Need & What You Get

How we would use our funds

  • Traveling expenses for the six members too travel to Puerto Rico, then to NYC, NJ and Boston. This includes roundtrip plane tickets to and from Puerto Rico and van rental for the Northeast.

Upon helping this tour happen, Miss Cactus & the Desert is more than willing to give back to the contributors! Below is list of how Miss Cactus will show gratitude depending on the amount that you decide to donate: 

  • Upon donating $10 or more, you will receive a copy of Miss Cactus & the Desert EP Oasis. 
  • Upon donating $20 or more, you will receive a copy of EP plus one of our merch items.
  • Upon donating $500 or more, you will receive up to 5 copies of EP, merch and a free private show at a venue of your choosing. 
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Follow Miss Cactus & the Desert on social media! You can find us on Facebook (as Miss Cactus & the Desert ) and on Instagram (@misscactusmuisc) and feel free to give us a listen! Our single "Laugh at the Confusion is available on Spotify, iTunes, Bandcamp, and pretty much any other platform you would like to find it on!

If you live anywhere in the Northeast or in Puerto Rico, feel free to come attend our shows! We will be announcing the tour in July- so if you find that you can support simply by giving us a follow, or by showing up a performance, it will mean a lot to us!

story:
My Story

Hi, my name is C.j. Harris and I'm a music producer from Birmingham, AL. I've been making music for over 10 years now. I've sold beats to many independent artists through my website (KingshipMusic.com) and recently gotten into Music Licensing for TV shows. Currently I have 3 publishing deals with companies out of Atlanta and LA. My music has been placed on shows like Bad Girls Club, Keeping Up With The Kardashians, Basketball Wives LA, and more. Although I've been blessed to have my music featured on these shows, the residual income hasn't been enough for me to handle all of the expenses to keep my career going and not nearly enough for me to live on. I still work a 9-5 job just like most people.

Believe it or not, the only equipment I have ever used to make music is an HP desktop computer (along with music production software) and an old Radio Shack keyboard. Well this past December my computer quit working and I haven't made any music since. This year I plan to jump-start my career as a music producer and entrepreneur by starting my own music production company (Kingship Music, LLC) as well as connecting with more publishers. But just like any other business, you need capital in order to start. That's where you guys come in...

The Capital

In order to successfully launch my company I'll need money for studio equipment & furniture, music production software, online promotion, state registration of my business name, taxes, copyright fees, and membership fees for the music organizations that I have to join. My goal is to raise $10,000 to cover all expenses and any unexpected things that could possibly come up. No donation is too small, no donation is too big. Any amount that you'd like to give will help.

The Perks

I am excited to be offering some cool perks for this campaign. I will be offering packages that include Exclusive Rights and Non-Exclusive Rights for instrumentals in multiple genres, Limited Edition T-shirts, and Beat Collaborations with a chance at landing a publishing deal. 

At the end of the campaign I will be creating a gratitude board that will hang on the wall of my studio with the names of each and every person who donated. It will serve as a constant reminder of the good people who contributed to making my dream become a reality. I will be forever grateful to you all.

If you can't contribute right now, that's OK! Please share it with anyone who may be able to help out! The more people that hear about it, the bigger chance to get it funded. Check out all of the great perks and preview my beat catalog at (KingshipMusic.com) Thanks so much!

story:
Hello! 

Help us raise money to release our self-titled EP Mischievous Minx! This started as truly a passion project in the winter of 2016 between John Petrucelli and Anastasia Hagermann. Our writing sessions churned out the handful of songs included on the EP. We recorded them this past June and have spent the last 5 months perfecting the tunes for your listening pleasure. By the end of the year we are hoping to raise $6,000 to cover the costs of recording, mixing, mastering, and releasing the EP. 

What We Need 

It means so much to everyone involved in the production that you are a supporter of new compositions by local musicians. Your contributions will go directly towards all the expenses involved with the making, promoting and releasing Mischievous Minx. This includes paying our recording artists, sound engineers and graphic designer. Then the funds received will pay for creating the hard copies of the EP and some super cool merchandise for our fans. Lastly, the remaining money will pay for the costs associated with promoting the cd and the EP release show on December 3rd at Cattivo in Pittsburgh.  

What You Get

You get our eternal gratitude and thanks for helping our music live! In all seriousness though, we listed a ton of cool merch, behind the scenes inspiration and physical copies of the EP as just some of the perks you get for supporting our passion for creating music.

The Impact

This project is the reflection of the unique blend of pop, jazz and r&b we've been developing over the past year. We think that our band will successfully connect with audiences across genres and serve as a way to get amazing musicians involved from rock, jazz, funk and even classical music as we continue to develop. We have a successful track record of projects, including albums such as "The Way" and "Presence" by John Petrucelli, and have contributed to dozens of bands and records over the past 5 years. We've also made sure to finish recording the album before asking for your contribution so that we can guarantee delivery of these fresh tunes.

Risks & Challenges

Putting a new band together is difficult- we're working with amazing musicians, a videographer, graphic designer and many others behind the scenes to get our music out there! Fortunately, Anastasia and John are both experienced musicians who have traveled the world and recorded before. We have finished the album but need your help to push us over the top!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about your campaign!
  • Please share our campaign with people you think might be interested in what we're doing!

story:
Story

Hi! I'm Elena Luchina, and I'm singer/songwriter of alternative rock band OYA. 
I would like to invite you to take part in creating of our debut album 'Mother of Nine'.

 

 

Musicians of our band have spent most of their careers playing other people's songs. We played at private parties, in the best symphonic halls and at sold-out hockey stadiums in our country and abroad. After 4 years of traveling our bass-player Vladimir and me decided to write original songs. 
When the number of songs was enough to play a concert, we asked our band guitarist Sergei Safonov, keyboardist Artem Panteleev and drummer Yury Andreev to join us.

The first 3 OYA songs "Like a Diamond", "Don't Leave Your Room" and "Hold the Door" were highly appreciated by musicians and radio DJs from Europe and America. More than 30 independent radio stations of UK, The Netherlands, France, USA, Canada, Brazil and Uruguay have included these tunes into their rotation. After our second performance, the band was invited to play at several open-air summer festivals in St.Petersburg.

 

 
Since January 2018 we have been receiving mails from all over the world with requests to purchase our CD. We realized that it is high time for us to get down to work on our debut album. This autumn, with your help, we are going to studio to record our new project like an independent band. 
 
We will work on our debut album in cooperation with world famous studio Metropolis (London). Studio and mastering engineers of this studio are known for their work with Rihanna, Jessie J, Adele, Chris Rea, Elton John and many others.
 
What if generosity will be more than we expected? We'll use all extra money to support the album, including marketing and publicity, videos and we are going to get on the road even more and to play as many concerts as possible.
 

Other Ways You Can Help 

If you feel inspired with all that and would like others to be involved please repost this message via Facebook, Twitter, Gmail, Linkedln, YouTube, etc!  

We appreciate any assistance you may be able to provide. Thank you very much!

 

Rewards:

★ ​Link to the album download a day before the official release

★ Autographed OYA CD

★ Handwritten letter from Elena 

★ Handwritten Lyrics from OYA

★ Signed score sheet

★ Stickers with cover artwork 

★ Vocal backing tracks!)

★ Guitar+vocals video song of your choice from the album. Message us to let us know what song you'd like us to play! The video will be sent directly to you and you'll be able to use it as you like:)

★Little surprise from OYA

 

Accounting:

Recording/Mixing/Mastering ~ 2820$

Photos/Design/Artwork ~ 565$

Manufacturing ~ 720$

Shipping ~ 800$

indiegogo and paypal fees ~ 545$
story_txt:
StoryHi! I'm Elena Luchina, and I'm singer/songwriter of alternative rock band OYA. I would like to invite you to take part in creating of our debut album 'Mother of Nine'. 

 
Musicians of our band have spent most of their careers playing other people's songs. We played at private parties, in the best symphonic halls and at sold-out hockey stadiums in our country and abroad. After 4 years of traveling our bass-player Vladimir and me decided to write original songs. When the number of songs was enough to play a concert, we asked our band guitarist Sergei Safonov, keyboardist Artem Panteleev and drummer Yury Andreev to join us.The first 3 OYA songs "Like a Diamond", "Don't Leave Your Room" and "Hold the Door" were highly appreciated by musicians and radio DJs from Europe and America. More than 30 independent radio stations of UK, The Netherlands, France, USA, Canada, Brazil and Uruguay have included these tunes into their rotation. After our second performance, the band was invited to play at several open-air summer festivals in St.Petersburg.  Since January 2018 we have been receiving mails from all over the world with requests to purchase our CD. We realized that it is high time for us to get down to work on our debut album. This autumn, with your help, we are going to studio to record our new project like an independent band.  We will work on our debut album in cooperation with world famous studio Metropolis (London). Studio and mastering engineers of this studio are known for their work with Rihanna, Jessie J, Adele, Chris Rea, Elton John and many others. What if generosity will be more than we expected? We'll use all extra money to support the album, including marketing and publicity, videos and we are going to get on the road even more and to play as many concerts as possible. Other Ways You Can Help If you feel inspired with all that and would like others to be involved please repost this message via Facebook, Twitter, Gmail, Linkedln, YouTube, etc!  We appreciate any assistance you may be able to provide. Thank you very much! Rewards:★ ​Link to the album download a day before the official release
★ Autographed OYA CD
★ Handwritten letter from Elena 
★ Handwritten Lyrics from OYA
★ Signed score sheet
★ Stickers with cover artwork 
★ Vocal backing tracks!)
★ Guitar+vocals video song of your choice from the album. Message us to let us know what song you'd like us to play! The video will be sent directly to you and you'll be able to use it as you like:)
★Little surprise from OYA
 
Accounting:
Recording/Mixing/Mastering ~ 2820$
Photos/Design/Artwork ~ 565$
Manufacturing ~ 720$
Shipping ~ 800$
indiegogo and paypal fees ~ 545$

story:
Who is King Vvibe?

I am an American Born Rapper from Portland Oregon. I have  been rapping my whole life but got real serious with music at the age of 18. Today I devote all my time to music and my son. I love all my fans and am thankful for all the love I get! If you have seen me perform live then you know Im the real deal and that I am ready to blow up with this music. Im going all out on my debut album and am going to make sure its what the people want. Im only working with the best producers and engineers in the industry because I want the album to be fire!

What I Need:

$20,000 to get it done right. This money will cover...

  • Recording
  • Editing
  • Mixing
  • Mastering 
  • Distribution
  • Marketing
  • PR
  • Music Video for 1st Single
  • Photoshoot

What you'll get!

I have many options and choices for you, Choose a level to get involved. 

  • Digital Download of Album
  • Limited Hard Copy of Album in CD Format
  • Official Wristbands
  • Official Tee-Shirts
  • Official Hoodie
  • Official Hat 
  • Limited Signed Hard Copy of Album in CD Format
  • VIP Live 45 Minute Concert via Instagram
  • VIP Live  in Los Angeles
  •  

You will be helping me....

  • Bring my 1st Debut Album to my fans worldwide
  • Producing a professional Music Video with single
  • Blow up Internationally 
  • Launch the "King Vvibe" Brand

If You can't Help with a donation...  

Share this campaign with all your friends using the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank You for all your support!

story:
Project Overview

Hi, my name is Revolution Child, I'm a female music producer, singer, songwriter, electronic and experimental music solo-artist, dancer, textile designer and creative whirlwind based in Northern Germany and sometimes the U.K. Writing songs and recording music is my purpose of life. After a real blow of fate I set myself the bigger challenge to self-produce my debut album and continued producing my first ep 'The Rebel in Paris Triology'. 

The purpose of this campaign is to fund my self-produced ep 'The Rebel in Paris Triology', the mixing and mastering of four songs, making one remix and filming a high-quality music video in a stunning location in North-East Germany which I found by coincidence via Facebook and which has come to me as a once-in-a-life time opportunity.

For my ep 'The Rebel in Paris Triology' I wrote and produced four songs. All four songs are experimental pop with my vocals on top. I love to experiment with synthesized sounds, orchestral instruments and soundscaping to create sonic layers that reflect the lyrics and mood of the song. The ep will also include a remixed version of one of the four songs. 

The music video shoot for one song from my ep will take place at the end of June in a very old, very beautiful and very big location so that only a professionally filmed music video will do it justice.

Your contribution will enable me to direct a detailed music video together with a talented film maker or music video director, work with a team and include a bigger number of professional dancers in the music video which has been an artistic dream of mine for a very long time and to release my ep before the end of the year.

For you to become a close part of this project and have some fun I created perks that will give you real insight into the creative process of making the music video and a real insight into recording the songs for my ep.

We can have a songwriting session or you help me choose the outfits for the video, learn the dance routine, visit the music video set or even be in the music video. Get a signed copy of my self-produced ep before the officlal release and find your name in the ,Thank You' notes of the music video.

 

Risk & Challenges

Yes, it's possible that things can go wrong, that the location will become unavailable, that I break a leg, that one of the dancers can't make it on set or that the weather will be bad but I will be prepared. We will plan and co-ordinate everything well in advance and as much in detail as possible. If the location will suddenly become unavailable I will find an alternative but I'm positive that this won't be the case. I will also keep you updated about the progress of the project.

The Impact

It is, without doubt, a big mission to accomplish but I am joyfully excited that after recording many hours on my own, there are people who have encouraged me to start crowdfunding and take my music to new hights and who have patiently supported my creative process.

This is, by far, the biggest project I am trying to accomplish but from past projects or co-ordinating the album and ep production myself, doing design work and taking on the challenges of being an indepent artist every day and I know that things not only take time but also want to be prepared well in advance. A successful campaign will make it possible for me to bring other talented people into this project and collaborate, rely on their expertise and trust their talent. You and me and my team will accomplish this mission together.

No help or support will go unnoticed. I know, money is tight and I totally understand if you can't contribute in a monetary way but that doesn't mean you can't participate and help me out. I still need you :) You can share this campaign with your friends and family, online and on social media, tweet about it or post it to your Instagram story and help me accomplish this mission and help me to release my ep and film the music video. Your help is super important for the scuccess of this project.

Thank you for taking your time to read all of the above and thank you for contributing to this campaign, for your support and for being a part of the ep release and  filming the music video. You will be my motivator, secure that this project will succeed and the reason I still might find some sleep between now and June :) We have a lot do, so let's get this started. Peace and Love and THANK YOU!

Revolution Child

 

PS: I will keep you updated about the progress about this campaign and the progress of the project either via Indiegogo or via my social media channels and also post updates to my website.

My website: www.revolutionchild.com

Instagram: @revolutionchild

Facebook: www.facebook.com/revolutionchild

Twitter: @revchildmusic

 

 

Sending you Greetings from my recording space in Northern Germany where I recorded my EP 'The Rebel in Paris Triology'.

story:
WHO IS GULLIESON?

I am an inspiring musician located in Pittsburgh, PA.  My musical journey started at the age of 14, it is has been the most effective way to express my thoughts and emotions.

 Two years ago,  I've started an independent label with two of my siblings, our mission is to reintroduce creativity, authenticity, and conscious raising musical content. Last year our team successfully gain a larger fan base, through our latest media marketing strategies, the response has been amazing!  Since, our recent media break through I am now able to meet and form new relationships with fans worldwide. My fan base population continues to grow at a constant pace, showing an increase of digital streams, merchandise purchases, youtube and website subscriptions.

If you are unfamiliar with my work and  just getting to know me, I invite you all to check out my music videos as the link is listed below. As you guys take the time to watch my videos, you will notice that every video entails a creative concept. This is done to help bring my lyrics alive, so to speak; creating a more vivid image. I am deeply passionate about about the music I produce, which is why I dedicate a significant amount of time and energy into each project. 

To learn more about me and my musical journey, please go to www.forevergullie.com .

Why I Need You Guys:

My team and myself have independently financed my musical campaign, though we have gained amazing feedback, we do not have the equability to sustain longevity within the music industry, which is our goal. Utilizing this platform will allow me to gain new supporters, who believe in my talent and wish to aid in my success.

50 songs and 6 videos later I'm realizing with my current team we do not have the money to meet the demands of my fan/supports. In addition to that I'm currently looking to quit my full time job so I can truly pursue this life long dream of mine.  I know there is no way in the world I can truly get to where I want to be in life working a job that takes up most of my time and energy.

The good news is I’ve been able to get some impressive data from my trial runs, which gives me a good indication on the demand for my content.  Me and my team have been able to generate this with a small budget of about 2,000, imagine what we can do if we can reached our crowd funding goal!

Seeing the reactions of others responding to my content is mined blowing!  Knowing that my hard work and efforts are appreciated and respected is rejuvenating and further motivates me to continue pursing my dreams, no matter the adversity that I may encounter.

To give you an Idea of the cost of Production here is a break down of where the funds will be going

Recording

I've already began the recording process but to fully get things completed It will cost around $2000.  This total includes recording, artist collaborations, engineer mixing, production and mastering.  In order to be taken serious in the entertainment industry , it is vital that your content not only be  good but your overall track quality be on a professional level.  So in order to achieve this I will be would like to work with some of the best within that budget.

Videos

Budget 5000

Todays society is very image/ video driven due to the social Media platforms  of today such as Youtube, Instagram, and Facebook etc.  So to keep the content not only flowing but entertaining  I want to provide some dynamic Atypical videos.   In the past I've haven't had the budget to fully bring my Ideas to life, I want to make some of the most mind-blowing and  impactful videos of 2018, to do this it will require better videographers as well as money for accessories for the videos (cars, models etc).  My goal is to give you at minimum 5-6 amazing fan picked videos from off this project.   

Marketing

Budget 6000

Last but not least is the marketing process, which can be so complex and expensive however it is very crucial to creating awareness and  expanding your fanbase.  I will be utilizing services such as Youtube Ads, Facebook ads, Streaming ad platforms and any other valuable platforms not listed to get the maximum exposure to TARGETED FANS. I will be pushing the project as a whole but the majority of the marketing will be going towards specific songs (topped rated/streamed)  The project will also be on all digital platforms, Itunes,Apple Music, Spotify,Tidal, Deezer,Amazon music, Google Music etc

EXTRA EXTRA

Any thing in addition to the goal will go towards a larger marketing company and merchandise ass you can see I already have some really fashionable merch for you guys and I'm constantly creating new designs which includes hats, key chains,bags tshirts, jogger suits, leggins etc

If you aren’t in a place to contribute financially that is ok!  You can support my movement by following me on social media platforms and help us get the word out about our campaign!

https://www.youtube.com/edit?o=U&video_id=d...

Instagram: @Forevergullie

Twitter: @Forevergullie

Facebook: facebook.com/Forevergullie

Thank you for your love and support .  Getting to create music and share it with the world means to me thank you for helping me make this possible

If you aren’t in a place to contribute financially that is ok!  You can support my movement by following me on social media platforms and help us get the word out about our campaign!

Instagram: @Forevergullie
Twitter: @Forevergullie
Facebook: facebook.com/Forevergullie
Thank you for your love and support .  Getting to create music and share it with the world means to me thank you for helping me make this possible

story:
ALABAMA ROSE IS RECORDING A NEW RECORD...

And we're hoping you'll help us make it as badass as possible. 

We've been working hard this year and are ready to get back to the studio to record our first full length album. Our goal for this campaign is to raise $3500 towards our recording costs, which will help us to add special elements to our album that we think you'll love. Please help us to spread the word about our campaign!! As incentive to help us, we've been putting together special merch packages for our backers. Here's what you can get!!

  • $20- t-shirt of your choice + physical copy of EP "Good Times for Bad Girls" 
  • $50- both Alabama Rose t-shirts + physical copy of EP + sticker pack 
  • $100- we lose our minds + you get a piece of all of our merch (2 t-shirts, EP, sticker pack, custom lighter and matchbook) + physical copy of LP 
  • $100+- minds are blown + all merch items + LP + custom merch specifically made for YOU (art work, photo prints, whatever you like, made for you by Rose herself)

Why Are We Crowdfunding?

Honestly, recording is expensive as hell. Our campaign will help us to raise almost half of what we'll need for our recording time. This is something we've never done for ourselves, and have our fingers crossed for the best. We chose Indiegogo because we get to keep any funds that we receive, even if we don't reach our goal. If we get 175 people to back us with $20, we'll reach it, no problem!! This'll help us to add special elements to our album. Think gospel choir and horn section. That's where we're hoping to go.

Your Donation Makes A Difference...

Any amount helps. And we'll be working our butts off right along with you.

Help Us Spread The Word!!

Some people can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Share our campaign wherever you'd like!! Groups, your social media, with your mom and dad, with anyone and to anywhere!!!
  • Indiegogo told us to remind you to use their share tools!!!

Thanks y'all!! See ya soon!!!

story:
If my life had a soundtrack, it would start here. 

This campaign is to help raise money for 2 projects. Both represent a side of my life while growing up that did more than just shape my musical influences. They shaped me into what I am today! 

"Wake-up Cowboy" - That Ol' Country with a New Flair!

  • I grew up performing western music at a western dinner theater called the "Rockin' R Ranch" This album features some of the most classic songs of the Old West that I grew up performing but also feature two original songs!
    • "Just Love" - The story of my sister with Down Syndrome
    • "Find Me a Cowboy" - Dedicated to my parents
  • Here is a little of what you can expect musically:

 

The Piano Sessions - Rotoscopers Approved!

 

 

The last 6 years my friend Morgan and I have been podcasting about our favorite animated movies. As the podcast goes on hiatus, I wanted to put together a full album of my favorite ballads from Disney, DreamWorks, Pixar, and Don Bluth with a few other surprises in between! 

  • Each song will be accompanied by an original piano performance that is sure to add new depth to your old favorites!
  • It will also include 2 songs in Portuguese

Here is a taste of what you can expect:

 

 

     

    Where the Money Goes: 

    • The goal for this campaign is set at $6,500 -All or Nothing-  and that money will all go to finish the album Wake-up Cowboy.
      • $3,000 of that will go towards recording
      • $1,500 will go to printing CDs
      • $1,500 will go to music licensing fees, misc. expenses, perk fulfillment, and Indiegogo fees
    • After that goal is funded, everything else will go to help fund The Piano Sessions. To fully fund that project, we need to reach $16K. It is a big stretch so every little bit helps!
      • The $10K that is needed for that album will be divided accordingly:
        • $ 1,500 for musicians
        • $ 4,500 in studio time
        • $1,300 for CD printing
        • $1,500 for Music Licensing  
        • $1,200 for misc. expenses, perk fulfillment, and Indiegogo fees

     

     

    So, I mentioned perks... I've got some good ones:

     

     
      • Your name and a 'Thank You' on my website
      • Chapters and exclusive stories from my upcoming e-book about my experiences growing up at a western dinner theater
      • CD's and a DVD from the Rockin' R Wranglers. (My Parent's Show)

     

     
    • My full digital catalog including in depth 'Making of' Podcasts and Videos
      • Even be IN THE STUDIO with me as I record one of the songs with an associate producer credit on the album(s)
      • Also, more perks will be added as we blow past the goal!

     

     

     

    The impact you make:

    I have been working on this project for over a year and have self-funded everything. Life has gotten in the way of me finishing it so many times. Your help would mean so much to me. This is not just a trip down memory lane for me. I want it to be an experience that entertains and warms the heart!

     

    Risks & Challenges

    I plan on finishing both projects if they get fully funded or not. However, it may take another 2 years to do it. If I get all $16k to fund both of these projects, my goal is to have it all out and finished by the end of the year! 

    Different things that could slow that goal down:

    • Health (I just had to take 6 weeks off of singing due to the flu)
    • Musician's schedules (Life happens)

    No, matter what happens, I will be 100% transparent in what is going on and when you can expect the perks!

     

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

    • I would love if you could get the word out and make some noise about this campaign!
    • You can use the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
If my life had a soundtrack, it would start here. 
This campaign is to help raise money for 2 projects. Both represent a side of my life while growing up that did more than just shape my musical influences. They shaped me into what I am today! 
"Wake-up Cowboy" - That Ol' Country with a New Flair!

I grew up performing western music at a western dinner theater called the "Rockin' R Ranch" This album features some of the most classic songs of the Old West that I grew up performing but also feature two original songs!
"Just Love" - The story of my sister with Down Syndrome
"Find Me a Cowboy" - Dedicated to my parents


Here is a little of what you can expect musically:


 

The Piano Sessions - Rotoscopers Approved!
 

 
The last 6 years my friend Morgan and I have been podcasting about our favorite animated movies. As the podcast goes on hiatus, I wanted to put together a full album of my favorite ballads from Disney, DreamWorks, Pixar, and Don Bluth with a few other surprises in between! 

Each song will be accompanied by an original piano performance that is sure to add new depth to your old favorites!
It will also include 2 songs in Portuguese

Here is a taste of what you can expect:

 
 


 
Where the Money Goes: 

The goal for this campaign is set at $6,500 -All or Nothing-  and that money will all go to finish the album Wake-up Cowboy.
$3,000 of that will go towards recording
$1,500 will go to printing CDs
$1,500 will go to music licensing fees, misc. expenses, perk fulfillment, and Indiegogo fees


After that goal is funded, everything else will go to help fund The Piano Sessions. To fully fund that project, we need to reach $16K. It is a big stretch so every little bit helps!The $10K that is needed for that album will be divided accordingly:
$ 1,500 for musicians
$ 4,500 in studio time
$1,300 for CD printing
$1,500 for Music Licensing  
$1,200 for misc. expenses, perk fulfillment, and Indiegogo fees




 
 
So, I mentioned perks... I've got some good ones:
 

 

Your name and a 'Thank You' on my website
Chapters and exclusive stories from my upcoming e-book about my experiences growing up at a western dinner theater
CD's and a DVD from the Rockin' R Wranglers. (My Parent's Show)

 

 
My full digital catalog including in depth 'Making of' Podcasts and Videos
Even be IN THE STUDIO with me as I record one of the songs with an associate producer credit on the album(s)
Also, more perks will be added as we blow past the goal!


 

 
 

The impact you make:
I have been working on this project for over a year and have self-funded everything. Life has gotten in the way of me finishing it so many times. Your help would mean so much to me. This is not just a trip down memory lane for me. I want it to be an experience that entertains and warms the heart!
 

Risks & Challenges
I plan on finishing both projects if they get fully funded or not. However, it may take another 2 years to do it. If I get all $16k to fund both of these projects, my goal is to have it all out and finished by the end of the year! 
Different things that could slow that goal down:

Health (I just had to take 6 weeks off of singing due to the flu)
Musician's schedules (Life happens)


No, matter what happens, I will be 100% transparent in what is going on and when you can expect the perks!
 
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

I would love if you could get the word out and make some noise about this campaign!
You can use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
*****INDIE MUSIC TOUR DE FORCE******

 

So I'm a film maker who was in the middle of pre-production on the film Matt Lewandowski and the Purple people which highlighted a futuristic America and how the empire crumbled.

Covid-19 said, you want to a do a film on a dystopian American future, hold my beer.  So my plans were temporarily thwarted.  Little did Mr. Corona know that I can maneuver my writing talents from the world of film to the world of music.

So the film was a beat by beat thriller of how America entered the 2nd Civil War - I took that same energy and put it towards a concept album.

So I wrote a 14 track/5 Skit album that connects to the movie and is literally a re-hash of everything that happened in America up until December 31st, 2020 - it's basically a timeline of this crazy year - just highlighting everything I've seen but from a 3rd person perspective - we're not taking sides.  I collaborated with some of the worlds greatest unsigned artist to put this thing together, the fact that this was culled together on a shoe string budget in under 2 months is little more than a miracle.

This is the most High Concept risky album that I can think of in a long time.  Consider the genesis of the album being this INDIE FILM about a modern civil war that has manifested itself into a concept album that doubles as an introspective look at America in 2020.  This is the most meta music is going to get in the 21st century lol

If you're worried about, well what Genre of music are we getting?  As you can see per the short medley in the video - we're spanning at least 7 different Genres, From Pop, to dance, to Hip Hop, to Rock, to Pop Punk to Blues and what I once called grunge(even though no one technically liked to call it that in the 90s).  All these genres had a profound influence on me growing up.  So it's a cornucopia of vibes.

Think of it like "Hamilton" the musical - Only the story takes place in 2020 America - and everyone of YOU are characters in this story!

This album will literally be a collectors item you can give to your children to help explain your trip through memory lane as you look back at the year of 2020 and the bumpy journey we all went through but it will remind you we are in this together and we WERE in this together.

I didn't include 3 nearly complete tracks in the medley because they are only 80% complete and oddly enough they are tracks that I'm most proud of, 'Year of the Rat' and 'Shooters'  and the B-side single 'Answers'- modesty is the core of my being but my honesty is an equal curse and these are quite frankly a few of the best songs in the last 5 maybe 10 years, and I'm very proud of them - they will be worth the price of investment alone, I promise you.  But there's lots of good stuff, I mean you're getting 14 tracks and I even did the 2 hidden tracks, so you're looking at 16 songs and 4 very very funny skits as well.  Running time is right now about 72:06   - so strap in it's a long one.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need to finish production on the Final 4 songs maybe 5 if I'm being more accurate (including the music videos) and then have the whole album mastered.  At this point in the game there might be an investment opportunity as I have my own vanity publishing so there may be an opportunity to come in as an investor and own piece of the publishing and there's a chance to earn money that way if sales sky rocket.

 

The Impact

  • In a country so deeply torn apart, it needs an outside perspective - one that can show it the way and help it get back on track.  Maybe this album helps kicks off 2021 to become the greatest rebound year in our countries history - and to have it start with an album from a bunch of underdogs would  exemplify the fortitude of America, and quite frankly the world. A world which has undergone a seismic transformation this year.
  • My mom cried listening to one of the tracks.

Risks & Challenges

There are no risks. If I meet the goal.  The album happens .  And whether I meet the goal or not The first single drops August 26th cause that's where my money ran out creating this album.  It ran out mastering that single and producing a music video.   When we meet the goal, the album is a go and will be released October 28th.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Like I said, investing is another way to help from a financial perspective and it might turn out to be a lucrative investment.  Like a stock investment - While it doesn't have the big names as you might like these are all up and coming independent artist.  You can help make this album the factory for future pop and rock stars. 

On the creative side i'm always looking to collaborate.  If you are a musician or vocalist and you think maybe you can add something to this album, like I said we're still working on a few of the songs - I love working with other artist and helping promote all crafts.  In that regard we help each other.  I'm open to everything, shoot me your thoughts or questions.  I'm excited about the potential of this.

story:
The Complete Classical Piano Course

Four Volumes with CDS & Web Link.

by John Geraghty

As a private piano teacher for many years, I have developed an approach to learning the piano that is fast and effective. It has worked for every student that I have taught from the ages of 5 – 75 years old. Contrary to what people say, you don't have to be young to start playing the piano. In fact, I have found that adults learn faster than kids.

Why I created the course

After seeing lots of piano students learning from You Tube videos, I felt that there was a need for a comprehensive course that can train a music student from beginner level to an intermediate / advance level without the need for a private teacher. 

There are four fundamental problems when learning from You Tube videos.

1. You don't learn the grammar (Notes and Rhythm). By not learning how to read the music you end up learning the music by ear. 

2. You don't learn technique. By not training your fingers you are not able to articulate the music correctly.

3. You don't learn theory. You don't understand what you are playing.

4. You don't have a consistent teacher. Imagine learning English at school by ten different teachers? Music is a language also.

About the course.

The Complete Classical Piano Course is a comprehensive self-learning guide to classical piano. The course consists of 4 books, 3 cds and unlimited access to over 800 HD videos online (mobile friendly!). 

This course is designed for the following students…

Beginners wanting to learn from the beginning to an intermediate/advanced standard of reading, playing and technique.

Students that played "a long time ago" and now wish to start again.

Intermediate students that can read well, but would like to learn new skills.

Musicians, songwriters and producers who want to enhance their playing skills.

As a training guide for all levels of piano teaching.

To work through the course you will only need access to a cd player and a mobile phone or ipad. This course can also be learnt on a keyboard (touch sensitive/pedal). You will not need to sit in front of a computer to learn from it!

THIS COURSE OFFERS NO GIMMICKS, NO FLASHING LIGHTS JUST GREAT CONTENT!

Whats inside...

Book One - Manual

In this book you learn and master the understanding of music. There are three essential parts that you would study.

  1. Notes 
  2. Rhythm
  3. Theory

CD 1

CD 1 covers everything you need to know and more about reading rhythms, from beginner to advanced levels. 


Book Two - Technique

In Book Two you learn and master technique. There are two training programmes. 

"Technique Programme—A"  is an 18-month training programme covering all 12 major and minor keys in scales, arpeggios and broken chords. Each week, you will learn new exercises that cover the essential techniques that train every finger and thumb. 

You will develop control, tone and speed. Mastering these techniques provides the skills required to play any type of music style. 

"Technique Programme—B"  is a 10-month training programme. This will train you in general playing techniques. This will not only help with classical piano techniques, but also other musical styles including jazz through pop piano. 


CD 2

Audio CD 2 will help develop your "musical" ears. When teaching oneself, it is important to know the pitfalls before you make them. This CD will make you aware of all the fundamental problems that you may encounter. 


Book Three - Practice Notes

In Book 3—Practice Notes, you will study how to practise efficiently through “The Art of Practising”. This volume also serves as a supplementary guide to each level of music found in Book 4—Music.

 


CD 3

You also cover aural training found under sections entitled Aural Awareness. These points refer you back to CD 3 to listen to the musical examples so that you can train your ears musically.


Book Four - Music

Book 4—Music  features five levels of well-known piano repertoire, each level contains six pieces of music from the Baroque, Classical and Romantic eras.

Each piece of music introduces new playing techniques that will enable you to improve your piano playing skills and sightreading abilities.

The music can also be accessed online and streamed and downloaded.

 

Online Videos   

After entering the password, the student will be able to access over 800 HD videos. These videos are there to watch for correct technique. 


Everything that would be played throughout the course has been recorded.

This includes all the scales, arpeggios and broken chords  found in "Technique Programme—A".


"Technique Programme—B" and all thirty pieces of music.                        

Each piece of music has been played by the right and left hand and also hands together.



That's the course!

What the funds will be used for.

£5500 would allow me to print off 500 copies of each book and £2500 will allow me to finish the Website.
If I received extra funds then I would use the money for marketing the product. 

Current stage of project.

At the moment apart from working on this pitch, I have just sent off Book 3 to have the inside designed. This will probably take between 1-2 months to complete as it's the largest of the 4 books. The other 3 books are finished. 
I also have about 25 videos to edit and then I'll have to upload all the videos onto the website, once the website designer has finished the layout.
I'm hoping for around November to have it all finished and printed ready for sale for the Christmas rush! but I can't guarantee this as I'm relying on other people to get there jobs finished and don't want them to rush their work.  

On a personal note. 

As you can see it's a pretty ambitious project. There's been a lot of late nights, lots of coffee and a massive steep learning curve. In the last year I've learnt ....

How to write a business plan, pitching to the bank, print on demand, long and short run printers, saddle stitch and perfect bound books, good and bad cameras for HD video filming/lighting and Final Cut Pro editing, online/offline marketing, page design/layouts, negotiating contracts, setting up a new book publishing company "Green Olive Publications Ltd" (I wanted the books to look as professional as possible) and finally pitching on Indiegogo!

I really need your help to complete this project and any funding would be gratefully received. 

Thanks

John


P.S. Please share this link to anyone who you think would enjoy learning the piano through this course. 

P.P.S Below you'll see the contents for Book One-Manual and a page extract.

story:
ATTENTION: THIS CAMPAIGN IS CANCELLED! 
We are unable to cancel or delete this campaign because of indiegogo's rules. According to indiegogo, "All campaigns that have raised funds must be kept live in order to preserve your campaign information and contributor details. Campaigns can only be deleted if they have not raised any funds." 
ATTENTION PREVIOUS CONTRIBUTORS: Please wait until the campaign has ended before refunds are issued. Indiegogo says it takes 5 days for refunds to be issued.




At just 10 years old, Tomimoto Airu (富本 愛琉) is ready to make international stardom! But without your help, this young idol's dream is crushed!!

***AGAIN, WITHOUT SUCCESSFUL FUNDING OF THIS CAMPAIGN, AIRU WILL NOT ATTEND IDOL MATSURI!***




Profile:

Born on: February 11, 2005

Belongs to: Actors School Hokkaido

Activity:

- Holds a live concert every month mainly in Sapporo and in Tokyo.

- Kids fashion model.

Rewards and perks

  • Autographed Cheki + Digital MP3 + HQ digital photo - $20 You can collect a personally autographed Polaroid photo of Airu + Download Airu's concert + You will have access to an exclusive photo of Airu at Idol Matsuri!
  • HQ Digital exclusive Photobook (50 pictures) of Airu in Seattle + Autographed Cheki + Digital MP3 + HQ digital photo - $30 Airu's first photo book shoot will be in Seattle! You can have this photo book ONLY through this campaign! + You can collect a personally autographed Polaroid photo of Airu + Download Airu's concert + You will have access to an exclusive photo of Airu at Idol Matsuri!
  • Exclusive video message to you + HQ Digital exclusive Photobook (50 pictures) of Airu in Seattle + Autographed Cheki + Digital MP3 + HQ digital photo - $40 Airu will personally thank you in a private video message for helping her achieve her dreams to perform in America! + Airu's first photo book shoot will be in Seattle! You can have this photo book ONLY through this campaign! + You can collect a personally autographed Polaroid photo of Airu + Download Airu's concert + You will have access to an exclusive photo of Airu at Idol Matsuri!
  • General registration + Exclusive video message to you + HQ Digital exclusive Photobook (50 pictures) of Airu in Seattle + Autographed Cheki + Digital MP3 + HQ digital photo - $60 Register with this perk and receive all rewards Airu has to offer! + Airu will personally thank you in a private video message for helping her achieve her dreams to perform in America! + Airu's first photo book shoot will be in Seattle! You can have this photo book ONLY through this campaign! + You can collect a personally autographed Polaroid photo of Airu + Download Airu's concert + You will have access to an exclusive photo of Airu at Idol Matsuri!
  • Digital MP3 + HQ digital photo - $10 Download Airu's concert + You will have access to an exclusive photo of Airu at Idol Matsuri!
  • Exclusive HQ digital photo - $5 You will have access to an exclusive photo of Airu at Idol Matsuri!
  • VIP pass + Exclusive video message to you + HQ Digital exclusive Photobook (50 pictures) of Airu in Seattle + Autographed Cheki + Digital MP3 + HQ digital photo - $100
  • * Attention: Since the cheki is Airu's main good at her merchandise table, the cheki is to be limited to one per perk. Additional chekis available at Airu's booth at Idol Matsuri.

**SCROLL DOWN TO SEE PERKS OF BEING A VIP!!**


Special VIP badge includes:

  • Priority seating and early entrance to all concerts and events!
  • Special gift at registration!
  • 1 raffle ticket for the autographed guest's weekend badge of your choice!
  • Guaranteed photo op with all Japanese guests!
  • Guaranteed autograph from all Japanese guests!
  • Ticket to the Ice Cream Social with all guests!

Risks and challenges

Learning from our past mistakes, we feel that this project is virtually risk-free:

Most perks are digital or fulfill-able at the event. The only possible risk is being able to get the chekis sent on time. We will collect and produce the chekis AT Idol Matsuri so there is no delay in sending the rewards.

Additionally, this fundraiser is approved by Airu's management and there is a contracted agreement between management and Idol Matsuri that these perks are to be fulfilled.
