story:
Hello,

I'm Katrice Cornett and I am the founder of Refreshing Cafe a platform for Independent Gospel, Christian & Inspirational Artists.  In 2012, my son Jermaine Jones also known as "The Gentle Giant" was sent home from American Idol Season 11 with the whole world watching him be degrated and made to look like a criminal on national TV.  This series of events sent our world into a tailspin. 

At the time I was trying to get my newly founded performing arts center off the ground and recover from such a devastating blow to my son's music career.  I felt the need to develop something to fight back.  So we birthed Refreshing Cafe, a place where artists can come and network, build their fan base, be appreciated, earn money and get a real understanding of who they are in the industry, at the same time, perfect their artistry without judgement.   We provide them with guidance, artist development tips, marketing materials, and foundational knowledge of how to establish themselves as a business. 

Refreshing Cafe has completed its sixth season this July 2018.  This CD compilation project is the next level of Refreshing Cafe.  This is an opportunity offered to the artists who choose to become a part of our community.  Many of the independent artists who grace our platform come with original material.  Their creativity is appreciated by our audiences and we encourage them to use our platform as a place to introduce their music to the world.  However, being able to produce, record and distribute their original compositions for some of them seems impossible to achieve because of the lack of knowledge on how to do it, but mostly because of the financial commitment it takes to produce a quality project that will be recognized and competitive in the industry.

Your contribution to this campaign will allow Refreshing Cafe to achieve our dream of being able to give our artists the opportunity to produce, record and distrbute their own compositions.  Each artist will not only be apart of this project but they will receive a professionally recorded single that will introduce them to the industry which can take their music careers to the next level.

What We Need & What You Get

Our campaign goal is $10,000.  This funding will allow us to pay for recording studio sessions, musicians, background singers, graphic designers for cd artwork and marketing promotions, advertising, cd replication, marketing campaigns, a cd release concert which will require building rental, sound, lighting and stage crews, distribution campaign, music and promotional videos, photo shoot and t-shirts, hats and marketing paraphernalia.

We are excited to offer the following perks:

  • One (1) Digital Download of Single of your choice
  • One Autographed photo & Digital Single Download
  • Invite to Pre-Launch Listening Party & Autographed Photo 
  • Refreshing Cafe T-shirt & One(1) Digital Download of CD
  • VIP Seating at the Release Party, CD & Your Name will be listed on the CD credits as a sponsor
  • Private Concert for top 25 sponsors, Professional Photo taken w/Artists, Autographed CD & Your Name will be listed on the CD credits as a sponsor

The Impact

The opportunities for indie artists have never been greater.  There are so many options to choose, methods to follow and results to achieve.  With supporters such as yourself it allows the artist to become totally creative with their projects.  It also helps make the industry more diversified.  Without the controlling demands of a record label, it allows the indie artist the opportunity to share their uniqueness.  

One of the greatest challenges of being an indie artist is funding and getting exposure, most of the time.  We have access to a worldwide audience but marketing and campaigning can become costly when trying to promote a new project.  That's where you come in.  Crowdfunding platforms such as this one help us to be able to compete with the record labels who have the funding.  

Your support through this platform will allow us to produce a music video which is one of the major ways to distribute music through platforms such as Youtube, Vimeo and others.  Some of the other marketing and advertising forums such as radio, and social media ads are other ways your support will help us to promote this project to make it a huge success.  

In short, with your generous support it will minimize the risks and challenges of this project tremendously.  You will be instrumental in being a vital part of the debut launch of five of the artists who are participating in this compilation project.  

I have been an indie artist for over 20 years and I would not have lasted this long without the support of my fans and people like you who believe in supporting the creatives community.  I thank you and I appreciate you.  I have overcome many hurdles and kept going in the face of many closed doors.  Many times I wanted to quit, but just in the knick of time someone would come along and let me know how my music kept them going, or I would receive a donation from someone who was blessed by my music.  These are the times that make it all worth it.  

Refreshing Cafe has given me the chance to help other indie artists who may be feeling that same way.  They may be on the vurge of giving up, but we can help them understand that the struggle is well worth it when one person is uplifted by their music.

Other Ways You Can Help

I do understand that every one may not be able to give a monetary donation to this project.  If this is you, you can help by spreading the word.  I encourage you to use the Indiegogo share tools to share our campaign with your friends and family.  We will also need volunteers to help with the CD Release Concert which will be in June 2019.  If you are interested in volunteering these are the areas that are available:

  • Marketing/Advertising Team
  • Stage Crew
  • Hospitality/Greeters
  • Runners (for artists)

Email me @ hpvisualconnections@gmail.com to let us know which area you are interested in.

Thank you so much for your willingness to invest in our music careers.  After  20 years of life as and indie artist I truly understand and appreciate how much your support really means.

Grace & Peace,

Katrice Cornett

story:
Help get the fully-composed sequel, concept album off manuscript paper and into a form you can hear.

What's so special about this project?

Let me be straight, and say that pretty much everything I do artistically is influenced by my Catholic faith. (Augustine is my confirmation name.) That being said, the word catholic is defined as universal. 

By honestly looking at the challenges faced when trying to reconcile my spirituality while living in the real world, I hope this album profoundly affects everyone who listens to it in some small way: lyrically, musically, or spiritually.

How do the contributions help?

As can always (sometimes annoyingly) be expected of myself, every note and word is carefully chosen. To paraphrase what someone once said about my music, "a new layer of onion is peeled off in each listening." Instrumentation and production are of the utmost importance to accurately paint my story.

  1. This particular fundraising effort is first and foremost to pay the superstar producer, Marc Lacuesta. He has a roster of Nashville successes, and I am especially excited for his vocal production talents. He and I went to Berklee together and can't wait to be working with each other again. If we raise enough, we'll also be able to use it to pay for:
  2. The other musicians playing on the project, who have put in so much time already to make these songs come alive.
  3. Marketing! It doesn't happen on its own...

What are the perks?

All people who contribute $25 or more will get the dual, digital album of Convert Augustine and Consummate Augustine. Of course, the physical albums are an option, as well.

My favorite perk is a choose-your-own adventure video series about the songs in the Augustine series. I'll personally hold your hand and bring you as deep as you dare into your choice of musical composition, lyrics, and/or the philosophies of each song.

There are some other fun things you can get, like:

  • A singing telegram.
  • A full song I write just for you.
  • A personalized tour of New Orleans.
  • Bound scores of the albums to follow along at home.
  • Time in the studio with us.
  • A really big thank you and executive credit on the album.
  • A music lesson.

When will the album be released?

The goal is to finish production of the album by the end of the year. That means you will receive it MONTHS before the general release date. The actual release date, if the campaign goal is reached, will be in the middle of 2016.

What if we don't meet the goal in the allotted time?

I'll take it as a sign. 

I can't in good conscience take your money without this base campaign amount to get started on the project. So if I don't reach the goal of this campaign, the music will remain in manuscript form, and you'll get your money back.

What will help us reach the goal?

  • First off, whether you buy something or not, please tell people! If you think someone might be interested, let them know. You can use word of mouth, or better yet, the Indiegogo share tools for social media, email, etc.
  • Pick a perk! You can always come back during the campaign and add to your choices.
  • Let me know if you want something I haven't offered. I am happy to add perks that I might not have anticipated being in demand.

story:
What is 'theOverflow'?

Simply put - it's access to nearly every Christian & Gospel song in your hands. It is how thousands of Christians are enjoying their music today.

"It's like Netflix for Christian Music"

  • TheOverflow membership gives you access to unlimited Christian & Gospel music for one low monthly price.
  • With TheOverflow app you can instantly listen to as many songs, albums and playlists as you want, as often as you want, anytime you want.
  • You can browse a growing selection of thousands of songs and new releases that are added regularly
  • Search for your favourite music and listen on your phone or on the web.





The Perks

Early Bird & Fan Packs : $25 each

Each "Fan Pack" comes with 3 months of theOverflow.


Membership Perks

Each "Membership Perk" is subject to availability in your country.

       
Help spread the news : share www.theOverflow.ca
Use the social buttons on the top left of this page.



FAQ

Is TheOverflow legal?

Of course! Launching TheOverflow required many complex legal approvals which have by God’s grace all happened. Through an agreement with our distributor, we ensure all Artists are paid based on their “share of listens” on the service 

How much will it cost?

You can access The Overflow service for $4.99 a month, after a FREE 7 day trial without adding a credit card. There are no commitments, and you can cancel at any time. By adding your credit card, you can extend your trial for FREE for up to 21 days.That's a total of 28 days FREE.

Why is TheOverflow Not Free?

We get this question a lot surprisingly.

The Christian music we know and love takes money to create, record and distribute. It's a very expensive process, and as people who benefit from it, we all have a responsibility to compensate the artists, musicians and labels that produced the music. 

TheOverflow is a paid subscription service, and we payout a large portion of our revenue to the rights holders - labels and artists. By using theOverflow, you help support and grow the christian artists and its community - so thank you in advance!

How does The Overflow get its music catalog?

We work with labels, distributors and aggregators around the world to legally license their music and make it available on The Overflow. If you are an independent artist who wants to submit to TheOverflow - please use either TuneCore or CDBaby, and make sure you select 7Digital as one of your digital stores.

What makes TheOverflow different from the iTunes or other download stores?

Well, for starters, they’re not designed for Christian & Gospel music fans! Secondly, download stores are just that – for downloads. They’re intended for one-off album purchases. With TheOverflow, you get unlimited Christian and Gospel music for $4.99/month – less than two lattes from your favorite barista, and about the cost of six albums a year from a download store. The cool thing about TheOverflow is you can still save songs, albums or playlists for offline listening. So, you can stream it, or save it. Either one. All for $4.99/month. ﻿

What does the name “TheOverflow” mean?

We love telling this story at TheOverflow. The story actually starts with the first formal presentation ever made, and before the company was formed back in the Spring of 2011. The title of that story was “One smooth stone felled a giant”. Why the David and Goliath analogy? Well, when you’re trying to compete with the world’s biggest company (Apple) and the world’s biggest e-commerce company (Amazon), you’d better have God on your side or you’re finished! 

As the unnamed company was growing, it was co-founders Stephen Relph and Chris Shaban desire to find a name that Christians would understand, and the world would want to understand. While trying to find a name, we were at a complete loss. Well, one weekend Christian artist Aaron Gillespie was staying at Chris’ house, he suggested that “whatever you do, put ‘the’ in the name”. After an unsuccessful brainstorming session at a restaurant, Chris shared Aaron’s feedback with Stephen. We decided to pray and seek God’s help right then and there to find the name. Within minutes, we said, “what about TheOverflow?”. Convinced the URL would no longer be available (note: the URL you want is pretty much never available), we checked anyway, and it was available. We knew that “Overflow” is found in Psalm 23, but were woefully unaware of the full context. What blew us away was that in this Psalm David (…that shepherd boy who wielded that one stone!) is talking about how God will “…Prepare a table before me in the presence of my enemies. You anoint my head with oil; my cup overflows.” We were frankly blown away. What an affirmation of the leading of the Holy Spirit! Within days, TheOverflow.com was purchased. 

 So… it’s our prayer and our belief, that God will use TheOverflow to help you go deeper in your faith, and impact the world for the glory of Jesus Christ. Remember, “You are the light of the world. A town built on a hill cannot be hidden” (Matthew 5:14). So… don’t hide your faith, OVERFLOW!!!

What are TheOverflow Devos?

The Overflow Devo brings together some of the most gifted Christian and Gospel Music artists to speak directly from God's Word. Each 7-Day Devotional plan is a mini Bible Study that centers around 7 songs that the artist has done. The Biblical context of each track is explained as they walk you down the path of how the Holy Spirit inspired them to translate his Word into song. We partner with the world's leading free Bible app, YouVersion, to ensure that the integrity of the scriptures is in every Devo. We hope you enjoy reading and watching The Overflow Devo!

story:
Music Vs. Potato Salad

Recently I saw on the internet someone wanted to make potato salad and created a kickstarter to raise money. Their goal was small about $10 but they far passed their goal reaching to $55,000...for Potato Salad....
I am a student and musician trying to record music. My project is called Dave E. Nation and is a mostly acoustic project with over 250 songs previously recorded. The plan is to record 30+ songs for a new record including new, old and unreleased material. 
This brings the question....do you like music more than potato salad? 

How You Can Help.
If everyone donates just $1 I will reach my goal in 3000 people. It seems like a lot, but it's far less than Potato Salad...If people choose the $15 perk in which they will get MUSIC, the goal will be reached in only 200 people.

I guess people just have to really think about it...do you like Music or...will potato salad win? 

What Do You Get?

Music....you will get music. (or just the satisfaction of knowing that your $1 went to making something that can't be consumed with a spoon or fork)


Risks & Challenges

You may not like the music...but you can at least be happy knowing you'll get to keep the music longer than the 2 minutes it takes to eat a plate of potato salad...


Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you're not into music and don't want to donate $1 or $15 for music...You can still help by sharing the campaign on your instagram, facebook, twitter, tumbr...or whatever. 


Don't let Potato Salad win.....

story:
Announcing INTERNATIONAL GRAND MUSICAL FESTIVAL 

                                                “MOTIF OF PEACE”!

HELP US to create the PEACE SONG-MESSAGE to people all over the world occasional to 21st September: “WORLD PEACE DAY!       

HELP US to organize the BIGGEST TELECONFERENCE BRIDGE from 10 countries -  THE MOST LOUD SONG-MESSAGE & Flash-Mob ever been held – through continents and countries: 10 participating countries through the continents.

All around the world song writers, famous musicians, world famous artists, non-professional singers, simple people are standing up for peace! 

From 10 points of the planet – from 10 countries: Russia, Moldova, Ukraine, France, Czechia, USA, Canada, Republic of South Africa, Brazil, Japan.

On 21st of September! BECOME THE PART OF THE PEACE SONG MESSAGE!

The project will have mass media support: Video,Internet,Audio,TV,social networks!

The FESTIVAL divides into two parts: general and song contest!

1)  General part – TELECONFERENCE BRIDGE between 10 countries- It’s a PEACE SONG MESSAGE creating by people from 10 countries – 10 Capitals (Moscow, Chisinau, Kiev, Paris, Prague, Washington, Ottawa, Cape Town, Brasilia, Tokio) – singing the PEACE for WORLD! Singing the WORLD for PEACE! Technical Teleconference Bridge and professional support needed! In every country people are gathering in the main square of the capital in front of the scene with LED! They use thousands of microphones! Video supprt! Main TV channels support! Teleconference Bridge! They sing together the peace song-message to the world! Thousands of doves will be launched in the sky!

2) Song Contest part – young non-professional singers from 10 countries have vocal contest during 5 weeks – best one from every country (10 persons) unites in creating international professional VIDEO CLIP - 

                             THE INTERNATIONAL WORLD PEACE HYMN!

3)  Spends for organizing GRAND INTERNATIONAL FESTIVAL “MOTIF OF PEACE” are total for 10 contries.

Every voice, every 1$ is your vote for PEACE!This is possibility to open your hearts using the strongest emotional instrument of our life – music!

                                             ONE DAY! ONE SONG! ONE PLANET!

story:
A Bit About Me

I've been a musician most of my life. In 2012 I began a spiritual journey of creating instrumental music in the tuning frequency of 432Hz which opens the atmosphere to spiritual encounters, healing and restoration.This resulted in a catalog of 12 albums-the 432experience collection-which can be found on my website: https://www.tasteofmanna.net/   

It's been quite a journey! It has also been two years since my last album.

A lot has happened and changed during that time; but, one thing has never changed: My desire to create music that captures the Sound of Heaven, and opens Heaven in fresh new ways.

Now-after a two year hiatus- a new CD, "Gates of Ascension" is at hand!

And, I need your help to release it!

This is an important project because it reveals where I am at in my journey. There's a deepening awareness of the heavenly realms of Glory that I am excited to share with you.

It's important for another reason, too. While my creative heart and process has not changed, the platform has! All the other albums are in digital format only. With the release of "Gates of Ascension" I am moving from "digital only" to included physical product.

My wife, Donna, and I have had many people asking for physical CD's. We also know there are many venues we want to reach that require physical product.

It's time to expand!

I believe "Gates of Ascension" is the right project at the right time for such a move. You, as a contributor, have a very important role to play in making this happen.

What Makes this CD Important

There were two personal experiences that has a powerful impact on me leading to the creation of "Gates of Ascension."

The first was a time of deep meditation on the experience the Apostle John had while exiled to Patmos. In a vision, he was shown a door standing open in Heaven and was called to come up. He was immediately caught up in the Spirit and taken through the door. I was made aware of how powerful and personal the connection is between Heaven and earth in radical new ways.

The second experience was a vision I had in which the Spirit of God took me to the beginning of a mountain trail, and He showed me a  gate set in place that opened to an ascending path leading to what He called the "Mountains of Worship."

These experiences ignited the creative fire for this new CD. Each track is a Gate of Ascension. The invitation is to step through these "Gates" into the atmosphere of Heaven and be taken to the Mountains of Worship.

The Songs

1. "Gates of Ascension"

"I am the gate; whoever enters through Me will be saved. They will come in and out, and find pasture." (Jesus)

2. "By a Hidden Path, I Come"

"One dark night, fired with Love's urgent longings, ah, the sheer grace, in the darkness I went out unseen, my house being all now still" (John Michael Talbot)

3. "Distant Lands"

"Blessed is the man whose strength is in You, whose heart is set on pilgrimage. As they pass through the Valley of Baca, they make it a spring; the rain also covers it with pools. They go from strength to strength; each one appears before God in Zion." (King David)

4. "Captivated by Beauty, Raptured in Love"

"For you reach into my heart. With one flash of your eyes I am breathless-I am overcome by merely a glance from your worshipping eyes, for you have stolen my heart. I am held hostage by your love..: (King Solomon)

5. "Heaven's Shores"

"Prophet of God, in quest of the uttermost, long have you searched the distances for your ship. And now your ship has come, and you must needs go. Deep is your longing for the land of your memories and the dwelling place of your greater desires; and our love would not bind you or our needs hold you." (Gibran)

6. "Chambers of Ecstasy"

"O lamps of fire, in the splendor of which the deep caverns of sense, dim and dark, with unwonted brightness give light and warmth together to their beloved." (St. John of the Cross)

What I Need and How You Can Help

Thank you so much for your support and for believing in me and my work.

I have a budget of $4,500.00. Your contribution will cover the costs of:

  • Production
  • Product
  • Marketing and Fees

Everything needed to make this new CD a reality!

If you are able to contribute, any amount would be greatly appreciated!

    1. If you are ready to donate, you can click the "Back It" button on the top right of this page.

    2. Or, if your prefer, you can give directly by going to my website: https://www.tasteofmanna.net/  and click the Donate button on my Prophetic Blog page.

    3. You can also help me by sharing this campaign--with your friends, on social media, Email, or word of mouth.

Thank You for Your Generosity

I've put together an exciting group of gifts/perks to give back to you. Any donation of $25.00 or more will include a 'digital download' of "Gates of Ascension"--Please check out the full list of Perks to the right!

Of course you can give any amount you want, and you also can give without wanting a perk.

Thank you for your support and generosity!

With all my love and gratitude,

John

story:
Hi, my name is Kasaundra Shields...

I am a Christian Recording Artist, songwriter, praise and worship leader and psalmist. I've been doing music for a little over 5 years now and God has given me a desire to do my first live recorded session. With this session, my hopes are to continue spreading the good news of Jesus Christ, reach a global audience and capture an authentic praise and worship encounter with the Lord. Every monetary donation you give will help fund this vision. Will you help me?

My goal is to raise $1, 200...

to go towards the costs of this live recorded session by October 10, 2018. The first 10 to give $50 or more will get a free physical or downloaded copy of my EP "Hey Joy"! All of the funds will go towards this endeavor. 

This project is of great value because...

I believe these songs will ignite a fire all over the world to pursue Gods heart in praise and worship from a sincere and honest place. I never could see myself recording music until I took my first step. So here I am again looking to take a bigger leap! I'm committed to fulfilling Gods plan for my life but I realize I can't do it financially on my own. Let's Grow!

story:
New Season. New Sound.

With every new season comes a new sound. Todd Dulaney and @dulaneylandmusic have opened an incredible opportunity to record LIVE. If you’re one who believes in, affirms, or is/was blessed by the sound the lord has shared with me down through the years, please consider partnering with me to release this sound. Songs like “Secret Place, “Chain Breaker,” “My Heart Is For You,” “We Worship,” and “Have Your Way,” came from moments with God. Help me do it again. But this time, on a greater level. Thanks to Todd Dulaney and his team for their innovation and extending a life-changing opportunity. To the future! 

After years of faithfulness to The Lord and giving my life over to His church and His sound, I highly look forward to sharing what is created with you.

What Is Needed & What You Get

Here's a breakdown: $15K

  • With a customized combination of my own selection of musicians and singers with the DulaneyLand machine and production capabilities, this is actually an underpriced priced opportunity. This will cover ALL instrumentalists, vocalists, producer, and mixing for a full worship project, recorded live in Houston.
  • If the goal is not met, we'll do the best we can with what we have. However, I have faith that the vision of a complete album will be created in excellence. 

Reasons You May Want To Help

  • You believe that the sound of worship that I create is a valuable contribution to the earth and the church.
  • My previously released music or live moments of worship and praise have touched your heart.
  • You simply love me.

A Moment of Transparency

We don't back down. We don't quit. And we don't give up. We level up. After coming out of one of the most difficult seasons of my life by making the heart breaking decision to close the church that I poured everything I had into, I'm coming back to my first love...worship. And while I pray it blesses you, I know it will serve as healing to me.

Other Ways You Can Help

The fact that you even came to this page means the world to me. If you're unable to contribute financially, it doesn't mean you can't help.

  • Please share this page on you Facebook feed.
  • Make plans to attend the recording once the details are released.
  • Steam and Purchase the album once it's released. Let's get it to chart on iTunes and Billboard.

story:
A new project for you in the heart of Brussels, Belgium:  the ADFONTES Consort of Music.​

As a composer with a predilection for euphonic tonal harmony, melody, sacred polyphony, fugue and counterpoint, I’m cordially inviting you to participate to an inspiring, thrilling and original artistic challenge and adventure: bringing the tradition of the sacred cantata and oratorio back to life through exciting thematic concerts, as well as in a real liturgical context.​

​The ADFONTES Consort of Music ensemble will gather and hire able, motivated and talented professional singers and instrumentalists - with skills ranging from enthusiastic conservatory students to seasoned musicians with strong soloistic abilities – who have the desire to foster, ignite and embody a real renaissance of sacred music!​

​Grounded in the treasures of our multi-secular tradition and practice but also looking boldly forward to the future, my aim as a composer and founder of this new ensemble, is to contribute in reviving the fruitful relation between Art, Community and Faith. Therefore, the ADFONTES Consort of Music will be primarily dedicated to the creation of a substantial body of new qualitative music of my own composition:  exuberant or meditative concert psalms, festive musical masses, thematic oratorios and cantatas - on acute contemporary issues and for recognized good causes.

During the first 2019/20 season, we aim to constitute a medium-sized instrumental and vocal ensemble of about 16 vocalists and 20 instrumentalists, to be expanded further over time.​

This early ADFONTES Consort of Music core will perform about 5 festive and thematic musical masses, followed by two concerts the same week, evenly spread every 2 to 3 months over the season and starting with a first creation concert end of November 2019. End of 2020, the Ensemble will premiere a major new oratorio as closure of the first season.​

Two catered choral rehearsals per month with a professional piano/organ accompanist, as well as one monthly catered orchestral rehearsal are foreseen, in a relaxed but productive & creative workshop atmosphere and spirit. Rehearsals and performances will be held in two historical churches in Brussels, and are foreseen to be recorded live in audio and video formats.

The creation of the vocal and instrumental music ensemble, the ADFONTES Consort of Music, has as primary vocation to contribute to and embody the renewal and contemporary renaissance of sacred polyphonic music.
​
More precisely: the ADFONTES Consort of Music will devote itself in priority and principally to the public creation, promotion and diffusion of the artistic work of composer Dimitri Arnauts, who will be its permanent artistic director and principal conductor.​

Dimitri Arnauts has devoted a large part of his artistic life and parcours as an artist and music composer to the creation of a substantial body of tonesettings of the Biblical Psalms, of Cantatas, Passion stories, Oratorios etc... 

Musically, Dimitri Arnauts admits humbly and gladly to be a modest and endebted disciple of the great Johann Sebastian Bach, at whose service he had the privilege to be moved, formed and inpired - through a year-long vocal practice of his masterpieces as a chorister.
 

​What do we ask you to support?

​As our aim is to create, perform and record music on a professional level, we ask you to consider supporting us by contributiing to the overall budget for the launch of the season (two concerts and one festive mass).

The total financial need amounts to 17250 EUR, which covers:

  • Hiring and rewarding 16 professional choristers, and 20 professional instrumentalists.- 5000 eur per concert and 1000 EUR per festive mass: 2x5000+1000= 11000 EUR wages for 5 rehearsals and 3 performances of a full-sized new cantata
  • On location recording costs for audio recording of the premiere concert: 1000 EUR
  • On location recording costs for video recording and editing of the premiere concert: 1000 EUR
  • All the logistical and organisational costs: venue hire, rehearsal room hire, catering, insurance, podium and scene furniture hire, heating, accompanist hire, promotion, ticketing and hosting, etc... : 4250 EUR
     

What do we offer you in exchange?

We offer you a variety of interesting perks, going from free audio tracks in low and hig res, over rehearsal access, free entrances to the concerts, sponsor listings, signed scores and even dedicated compositions and an annual dinner in Brussels... + a professional music performance and production workflow, and our eternal gratitude !
 

    What are the risks?

    If we do not meet the total funding needs for the launch of the first season as foreseen, all funds will be reimbursed to each backer on Indiegogo.

    As we will hire young professional musicians only, high quality will surely be delivered.

    All the funds will be used in a careful and responsible way, and we will issue a detailed and accurate spending overview towards all backers at completion of the project.
